Film.opisFilma: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
Film.igralci: Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Jo

Film.opisFilma: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
Film.igralci: Seth Rogen, James Franco, Gary Cole
